description: Try our easy to follow Pizza Pot Pies recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pizza Pot Pies Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Divide dough into 4 equal portions. Roll out until large enough to cover ramekin. Lay over ramekins, brush with egg and sprinkle with cheese. Bake for 10 minutes or until golden. Garnish with parsley.
